description: Offered at the University of Minnesota Biological Field Station at Itasca State Park, Minnesota, this course provides study (lectures, readings, laboratory work and short field trips followed by extensive independent field research) in a wide range of habitats. The first week is spent on campus and the remaining three weeks are spent at the field station. Offered in 2002 and in alternate years during Interim. Prerequisite: Biology 125 and 126.
name: Winter Ecology
